rules_text:
Whenever Sena is blocked, it gains trample and gets +X/+0, where X is its power, until end of turn.
Whenever Sena deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then if it dealt 6 or more damage this turn, and you both own and control Sena and a creature named Lanz, exile them, then meld them into Lanz and Sena, Power Unbound.
rules_text2:
Vigilance, trample
Lanz and Sena, Power Unbound enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of damage dealt this turn.
{T}, Remove five +1/+1 counters from Lanz and Sena, Power Unbound: It gains indestructible until end of turn. Damage that would be dealt to Lanz and Sena, Power Unbound this turn is dealt to that sources controller instead.
